column2: geom_raster(data = extrapolation_areas_df, aes(x = x, y = y), fill = "red2") +
labs(title = "MESS Analysis - Areas With Extrapolation Errors") +
ggsave(error_plot, filename = here("Lab6_SDMs_correlative", "maps", "warbler_extrapolation_errors.png"), dpi = 150, units = c('in'), width = 10, height = 6)
